languages.text: Юркий сервочереп оказывается проворнее, чем вы могли бы предположить. Вы гоняетесь за ним по всем доступным вам нижним палубам, и каждый раз он ускальзывает из ваших рук. Заметив ваше странное поведение, один из блюстителей прерывает вашу погоню ударом по голове, и сквозь заплывающий глаз вы видите, как сервочереп растворяется в полутьме коридора.

traits.locale_text: Юркий сервочереп оказывается проворнее, чем вы могли бы предположить. Вы гоняетесь за ним по всем доступным вам нижним палубам, и каждый раз он ускальзывает из ваших рук. Заметив ваше странное поведение, корабельная охрана без предупреждения бьет вас дубинкой по голове, и сквозь заплывающий глаз вы видите, как сервочереп растворяется в полутьме коридора.

languages.text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.
languages.original_text: Юркий сервочереп оказывается проворнее, чем вы могли бы предположить. Вы гоняетесь за ним по всем доступным вам нижним палубам, и каждый раз он ускальзывает из ваших рук. Заметив ваше странное поведение, один из блюстителей прерывает вашу погоню ударом по голове, и сквозь заплывающий глаз вы видите, как сервочереп растворяется в полутьме коридора.

traits.locale_text: The nimble servo-skull is quicker than you imagined. You chase it all around the lower decks you have access to, only for it to slip from your grasp every time. Noticing your odd behaviour, ship security cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. As your eye begins to swell, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

The nimble servo-skull is quicker than you imagined. You chase it all around the lower decks you have access to, only for it to slip from your grasp every time. Noticing your odd behaviour, ship security cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. As your eye begins to swell, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

The nimble servo-skull is quicker than you imagined. You chase it all around the accessible lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing your odd behaviour, ship security cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. As your eye begins to swell, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. {mf|He|She} chases one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through {mf|his|her} grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts the Rogue Trader's chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of {mf|his|her} rapidly swelling eye, {mf|he|she} sees the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. {mf|He|She} chases one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through {mf|his|her} grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts the Rogue Trader's chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of {mf|his|her} rapidly swelling eye, {mf|he|she} sees the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

languages.text: 伺服头骨的速度比你想象得更快。你在下层甲板不受限制的区域拼命追逐着伺服头骨，但伺服头骨某次都从你手中溜走。一名执法者注意到了你的古怪行为，一拳打在你脸上，阻止了这场追逐。你的眼睛迅速肿胀起来，从眼皮狭窄的间隙中，你看到那颗伺服头骨很快消失在阴暗的走廊里。
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

traits.locale_text: 伺服头骨的速度比你想象得更快。你在下层甲板不受限制的区域拼命追逐着伺服头骨，但伺服头骨某次都从你手中溜走。一名执法者注意到了你的古怪行为，一拳打在你脸上，阻止了这场追逐。你的眼睛迅速肿胀起来，从眼皮狭窄的间隙中，你看到那颗伺服头骨很快消失在阴暗的走廊里。

languages.text: Los servocráneos son más rápidos de lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante creía. Persigues a uno por las zonas no restringidas de las cubiertas inferiores, pero no consigues atraparlo. Al ver tu extraño comportamiento, una guardia pone fin a la persecución con un puñetazo. Por la estrecha apertura de tu ojo cada vez más hinchado, ves al servocráneo desaparecer por un pasillo en penumbra.
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

traits.locale_text: Los servocráneos son más rápidos de lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante creía. Persigue a uno por las zonas no restringidas de las cubiertas inferiores, pero no consigue atraparlo. Al ver su extraño comportamiento, una guardia pone fin a la persecución con un puñetazo. Por la estrecha apertura de su ojo cada vez más hinchado, ve al servocráneo desaparecer por un pasillo en penumbra.

languages.text: サーヴォスカルはローグトレーダーが思うより素早い。下甲板の非制限区域を駆け巡り追いかけるが、ことごとく手元をすり抜けていく。奇妙な行動に気づいた執行官の一人がローグトレーダーの頭に一撃を食らわせ、追跡を阻止する。ローグトレーダーの目はすぐさま腫れ上がり、狭くなった視界からはサーヴォスカルが薄明かりの廊下に消えていくのが見えた。
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカルはローグトレーダーが思うより素早い。下甲板の非制限区域を駆け巡り追いかけるが、ことごとく手元をすり抜けていく。奇妙な行動に気づいた執行官の一人がローグトレーダーの頭に一撃を食らわせ、追跡を阻止する。ローグトレーダーの目はすぐさま腫れ上がり、狭くなった視界からはサーヴォスカルが薄明かりの廊下に消えていくのが見えた。

languages.text: Die Servoschädel sind schneller, als du dachtest. Du jagst einen von ihnen durch die frei zugänglichen Bereiche der Unterdecks, aber er entwischt dir immer wieder. Einer der Enforcer bemerkt dieses merkwürdige Verhalten und setzt deiner Jagd mit einem Schlag auf den Kopf ein Ende. Durch dein anschwellendes Auge siehst du den Servoschädel in einem düsteren Korridor verschwinden.
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

traits.locale_text: Die Servoschädel sind schneller, als du dachtest. Du jagst einen von ihnen durch die frei zugänglichen Bereiche der Unterdecks, aber er entwischt dir immer wieder. Einer der Enforcer bemerkt dieses merkwürdige Verhalten und setzt deiner Jagd mit einem Schlag auf den Kopf ein Ende. Durch dein anschwellendes Auge siehst du den Servoschädel in einem düsteren Korridor verschwinden.

Die Servoschädel sind schneller, als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gedacht hatte. {mf|Er|Sie} jagt einen durch die gesamten frei zugänglichen Bereiche der Unterdecks, aber er entwischt {mf|ihm|ihr} immer wieder. Einer der Enforcers bemerkt dieses merkwürdige Verhalten und setzt der Hatz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit einem Schlag auf den Kopf ein Ende. Durch {mf|sein|ihr} immer weiter anschwellendes Auge sieht {mf|er|sie} den Servoschädel einen schummrigen Gang entlang davonfliegen.

languages.text: Les servocrânes sont plus rapides que ne le pensait le Libre-Marchand. Vous en poursuivez un dans toutes les zones non restreintes des ponts inférieurs, mais ce dernier finit toujours par vous glisser entre les doigts. Remarquant son comportement inhabituel, un membre des exécutants vient vous assener un gros coup à la tête, mettant ainsi un terme à votre folle poursuite. Par la fine ouverture de votre œil déjà gonflé, vous apercevez le servocrâne disparaître dans un couloir mal éclairé.
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.

traits.locale_text: Les servocrânes sont plus rapides que ne le pensait {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. {mf|Il|Elle} en poursuit un dans toutes les zones non restreintes des ponts inférieurs, mais ce dernier finit toujours par lui glisser entre les doigts. Remarquant son comportement inhabituel, un membre des exécutants vient frapper {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans la tête, mettant ainsi un terme à la folle poursuite. Par la fine ouverture de son œil déjà gonflé, {mf|il|elle} aperçoit le servocrâne disparaître dans un couloir mal éclairé.

languages.text: Hizmeletler, Hür Tacir'in beklediğinden çok daha hızlı çıkıyor. Alt güvertelerde serbest dolaşan hizmeletlerden birini kovalıyorsun ama her seferinde senden kaçmayı başarıyor. Bu garip durumu fark eden bir infazcı, kafana attığı sert bir darbeyle seni durduruyor. Şişmeye başlayan gözünden, hizmeletin yarı karanlık bir koridorda kaybolduğunu görüyorsun.
languages.original_text: The servo-skulls are quicker than the Rogue Trader imagined. You chase one all over the unrestricted areas of the lower decks, only for it to slip through your grasp every time. Noticing this odd behaviour, one of the enforcers cuts your chase short with a blow to the head. Through the narrowing aperture of your rapidly swelling eye, you see the servo-skull disappear down a half-lit corridor.
